comments.body: How do use the new transformers? Will additional flags be added to https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/options/etcd.go#L65 in a follow up PR?
Yes, working with others to do that (proposal is still being discussed for that part).  The transformer interface should be opaque to config and vice versa.
